name: @0xpolygonhermez/zkevm-contracts
description: Core contracts for the Polygon Hermez zkEVM
author: 0xPolygonHermez

scripts.saveDeployment:goerli: mkdir -p deployments/goerli_$(date +%s) && cp -r deployment/deploy_*.json deployments/goerli_$(date +%s) && cp .openzeppelin/goerli.json deployments/goerli_$(date +%s) && cp deployment/genesis.json deployments/goerli_$(date +%s)
scripts.saveDeployment:mainnet: mkdir -p deployments/mainnet_$(date +%s) && cp -r deployment/deploy_*.json deployments/mainnet_$(date +%s) && cp .openzeppelin/mainnet.json deployments/mainnet_$(date +%s) && cp deployment/genesis.json deployments/mainnet_$(date +%s)
scripts.deploy:ZkEVM:localhost: rm -f .openzeppelin/unknown-31337.json && node deployment/1_createGenesis.js && npx hardhat run deployment/2_deployPolygonZKEVMDeployer.js --network localhost && npx hardhat run deployment/3_deployContracts.js --network localhost
scripts.deploy:testnet:ZkEVM:localhost: npm run prepare:testnet:ZkEVM:localhost && npm run deploy:ZkEVM:localhost
scripts.deploy:ZkEVM:goerli: node deployment/1_createGenesis.js && npx hardhat run deployment/3_deployContracts.js --network goerli && npm run saveDeployment:goerli
scripts.deploy:testnet:ZkEVM:goerli: npm run prepare:testnet:ZkEVM:goerli && npm run deploy:ZkEVM:goerli
scripts.deploy:ZkEVM:mainnet: node deployment/1_createGenesis.js && npx hardhat run deployment/3_deployContracts.js --network mainnet && npm run saveDeployment:mainnet
scripts.lint: npx eslint ./test && npx eslint ./docker/scripts && npx eslint ./deployment && npx eslint ./src
scripts.lint:fix: npx eslint ./test --fix && npx eslint ./docker/scripts --fix && npx eslint ./deployment --fix && npx eslint ./src --fix
scripts.gas:report:file: rm -f .openzeppelin/unknown-31337.json && REPORT_GAS=true REPORT_GAS_FILE=true npx hardhat test
scripts.deploy:testnet:ZkEVM:test:goerli: npm run prepare:testnet:ZkEVM:goerli && npm run deploy:ZkEVM:test:goerli
scripts.deploy:ZkEVM:test:goerli: node deployment/1_createGenesis.js --test && npx hardhat run deployment/3_deployContracts.js --network goerli && npm run saveDeployment:goerli
